initial_reviews.review_title: Edrone helps me a lot with my ecommerce stuff
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about edrone?
As a marketing specialist in the B2C sector, I am looking for solutions that will be useful, simple and quickly help me achieve my goal. I have a few brands under my management and what I like about Edrone is the fact that I have all store panels in one login module. I have never specialized in marketing automation and I must admit that at the beginning I was afraid whether I would be able to set up scrips myself, but it turned out to be really simple. I had a few problems, but the consultant helped me and sent me an online tutorial. I also appreciate the possibility of copying sales scenarios; for several brands, it really saves a lot of time. A plus for a nice and efficient configuration with my CMS.

What do you dislike about edrone?
I know it's a security issue and it should be an advantage, but I often don't want to look at my phone to enter the code for 2 FA.

What problems is edrone solving and how is that benefiting you?
What I like about Edrone is how easily it shows me the segmentation of my customers. It was great when I was a new employee and I didn't know what I was doing yet. Additional scenarios such as codes, birthdays and saving the cart have a real impact on sales.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Edrone is a tool that does the work for us, making it easy and intuitive to use and implement.
